name: Robo Rocket Repair
description:
The Robo Rocket Repair is a Local Multiplayer game for up to 4 people with the XBox Controllers.

To play the game in browser use below controllers:

Player1: WASD, Space

Player2:ArrowKeys, M

You can also download the game and connect with Xbox devices.

For more than 2 players you need XboxControllers:

leftStick = movement

X Button = Dash
